name: Coval
headline: Simulation & Evaluation for AI Agents
description:
Coval is a simulation & evaluation platform for autonomous AI agents, helping engineers launch dependable assistants across chat, voice, and other modalities. 
We simulate thousands of scenarios engineers don't have to manually test their agents. Our CI/CD evaluations automatically simulate and detect regressions.

founders.name: Brooke Hopkins, Founder
founders.description: Building evaluation for AI agents, previously led eval infra at Waymo 🚙

# Ship reliable AI Agents faster
Simulation & evals for voice and chat agents
Simulation & evals for voice and chat agents
[Book A Free Demo](https://coval.dev/<https:/cal.com/bnhopkins/demo>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2r3aydMUtf21dgRfYgmjqsZDDPE.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rvvJ07ek8eiNF6CW7e9vshgrK1I.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rvvJ07ek8eiNF6CW7e9vshgrK1I.png)
Built by experts in autonomous testing
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/D0fRltP79qjaA1nKSEKIQLWjQA4.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pxcIY16RrN4wQqOUPMchpmgXM.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hUJBqpxoKijlRCKB5C51cg6zsss.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/IiHbpNKBdoQSYBjiLAWF0PENswQ.webp)
## Tired of manually testing your AI agents?
Simulate thousands of scenarios from a few test cases. You create the prompts, we simulate environments to test your agents from all directions.
## AI-Powered Simulations
### We chat with your agent to generate test cases.
## Voice AI Compatible
### We can call your agent via voice just as easily as text.
## How Coval works
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WGMheK9igaNhGCD3XKVrHwGS5Q.png)
### Simulate conversations
Simulate agent conversations using scenario prompts, transcripts, workflows, or audio inputs, with customizable voices and environments for advanced testing.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WGMheK9igaNhGCD3XKVrHwGS5Q.png)
### Simulate conversations
Simulate agent conversations using scenario prompts, transcripts, workflows, or audio inputs, with customizable voices and environments for advanced testing.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WGMheK9igaNhGCD3XKVrHwGS5Q.png)
### Simulate conversations
Simulate agent conversations using scenario prompts, transcripts, workflows, or audio inputs, with customizable voices and environments for advanced testing.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n0CH2ZEXAEnmopfQ1qPnZ8KY5qc.png)
### Launch evaluations
Evaluate agent performance with a range of built-in metrics (e.g., latency, accuracy, tool-call effectiveness, instruction compliance) or custom-built metrics tailored to your needs.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n0CH2ZEXAEnmopfQ1qPnZ8KY5qc.png)
### Launch evaluations
Evaluate agent performance with a range of built-in metrics (e.g., latency, accuracy, tool-call effectiveness, instruction compliance) or custom-built metrics tailored to your needs.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n0CH2ZEXAEnmopfQ1qPnZ8KY5qc.png)
### Launch evaluations
Evaluate agent performance with a range of built-in metrics (e.g., latency, accuracy, tool-call effectiveness, instruction compliance) or custom-built metrics tailored to your needs.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PN3JPL4LiGIQY73jgo6TKOdRILU.png)
### Track your regressions
Compare evaluation results with transcripts and audio replays, re-simulate prompt changes, set performance alerts, and incorporate human-in-the-loop labeling.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PN3JPL4LiGIQY73jgo6TKOdRILU.png)
### Track your regressions
Compare evaluation results with transcripts and audio replays, re-simulate prompt changes, set performance alerts, and incorporate human-in-the-loop labeling.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PN3JPL4LiGIQY73jgo6TKOdRILU.png)
### Track your regressions
Compare evaluation results with transcripts and audio replays, re-simulate prompt changes, set performance alerts, and incorporate human-in-the-loop labeling.
## From development to production observability
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5HmNUOlezSsoylmMvnHYUmU6jS0.png)
### Monitor production calls
Log all production calls & evaluate live-performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5HmNUOlezSsoylmMvnHYUmU6jS0.png)
### Monitor production calls
Log all production calls & evaluate live-performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5HmNUOlezSsoylmMvnHYUmU6jS0.png)
### Monitor production calls
Log all production calls & evaluate live-performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Fb73SMhqw0EX6gctVGRJ0dNjeE.png)
### Define your alerts
Get instant alerts for performance thresholds or off-path behavior.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Fb73SMhqw0EX6gctVGRJ0dNjeE.png)
### Define your alerts
Get instant alerts for performance thresholds or off-path behavior.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Fb73SMhqw0EX6gctVGRJ0dNjeE.png)
### Define your alerts
Get instant alerts for performance thresholds or off-path behavior.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ro2nQW9T8vREvkij5ckm0s5wkoM.png)
### Analyze performance
Review your runs & trace workflows to optimize your AI agents.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ro2nQW9T8vREvkij5ckm0s5wkoM.png)
### Analyze performance
Review your runs & trace workflows to optimize your AI agents.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ro2nQW9T8vREvkij5ckm0s5wkoM.png)
### Analyze performance
Review your runs & trace workflows to optimize your AI agents.
Why us?
## Coval brings a decade of research in self-driving to conversational AI
#### Built on Proven Foundations
Our systems are based on years of developing and scaling testing infrastructure at Waymo.
#### Metrics that Matter
We work closely with you to define the evaluation metrics that drive your business outcomes.
#### Developer-First Design
Seamless integrations & intuitive workflows help you focus on shipping reliable agents faster.

## Listen to what our customers say
“Coval’s simulation and evaluation platform has been the game changer for us. Before Coval, we were spending countless hours pulling our hair out trying to make sure our voice agents behaved the way our customers wanted. Now, with a few tests we can deploy production ready voice AI agents in a fraction of the time.”
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KIYG9J6GzL5xGxva1SZdMiXym28.jpeg)
Will Bodewes | CEO, Phonely 
[Read Case Study](https://coval.dev/<./blog/customer-spotlight-how-phonely-uses-ai-agent-evaluations-to-build-better-voice-agents>)

generated_description:
**Coval: Revolutionizing AI Agent Simulation and Evaluation**

Founded in 2024 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, Coval is a forward-thinking startup focused on refining the way we test and launch autonomous AI agents, specifically in chat and voice modalities. With a lean team of five, Coval is making waves in the industry by transforming the cumbersome process of manual testing into an automated, efficient simulation experience.

**Mission at Hand**

Coval's mission is simple yet powerful: to enhance the simulation and evaluation processes for AI agents. By enabling engineers to simulate thousands of potential scenarios, Coval allows for comprehensive testing without the labor-intensive manual effort that usually accompanies it. The platform automatically detects regressions through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) evaluations, ensuring that agents maintain their reliability and performance standards.

**Recent Innovations and Developments**

Recently, Coval has been making headlines, having successfully raised $3.3 million to expand its capabilities, particularly in integrating self-driving car simulation techniques into AI voice and chat agents. This significant funding round highlights the potential and demand for robust evaluation platforms. 

You can read more about it here: [Tech Crunch Announcement](https://coval.dev/<./blog/coval-raises-3-3-to-to-bring-self-driving-car-simulation-to-ai-voice-chat-agents>).

**How Does Coval Work?**

Coval’s platform is built on a foundation of expert research from the self-driving sector, particularly from Waymo, bringing a decade of proven testing infrastructure to the world of conversational AI. Here’s how it operates:

1. **Simulation Scenarios**: Coval allows users to simulate conversations and agent interactions using various inputs—be it prompts, transcripts, or workflows—across customizable environments.

2. **Performance Evaluation**: Whether it’s latency, accuracy, or custom metrics tailored to user needs, Coval provides thorough evaluations to ensure agents meet performance standards.

3. **Regression Tracking**: Users can easily compare results, re-simulate changes, and set performance alerts to quickly address any issues.

4. **Holistic Monitoring**: Coval enables users to log and evaluate live production calls, ensuring that AI agents are continuously performing well in real-world scenarios.

**Why Choose Coval?**

Coval isn't just another testing tool; it's a complete ecosystem aimed at accelerating the development lifecycle of AI agents. By focusing on seamless integrations, user-friendly workflows, and tailored metrics, Coval helps businesses release reliable AI agents faster than ever before.

Coval’s platform has already received praise from peers such as Will Bodewes, CEO of Phonely, who describes it as a "game changer" in deploying production-ready voice agents with remarkable efficiency.

For those eager to enhance their AI capabilities, Coval offers a free demo—a clear indication that they are confident in their platform's value. 

Discover more about Coval on their [website](https://coval.dev).

In a space where reliability is crucial, Coval is elevating the standard for what AI agent testing can and should be.
